title: Epistemological understandings of Zilean.
body:
I have the capability to understand all epistemological information. i even know the meaning of life. Answer, under the assumption that empiricism is the correct philosophy, the meaning of life and existence of god can be proven simply through human experience with these phenomena because these experiences are reliable and therefore provide a basis for knowledge of god/ the meaning of life. 

why does all of this matter? It defines what you know and what you think you know or what you believe you know and questions whether knowledge matters if knowledge exists and if knowledge of known knowledge can be known as knowledge of known knowledge.

Nihilism and existentialism are the basic equilibrium's of all cognition.
